nodes.text: Republic Medcenter was a holovid that had begun circulating by 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars. Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Senator Padmé Amidala were both critical of the production, the latter condemning the performance of a starring actress as "awful."
Republic Medcenter was mentioned briefly in The Clone Wars: No Prisoners , which was released in 2009 and written by Karen Traviss as part of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars multimedia project.
